amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that Customs and Border Protection should continue to focus on reporting and analysis of trade flows to prevent the spread of methamphetamine.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4669 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4669 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S7496-7497; text: CR S7496) To express the sense of the Senate that Customs and Border Protection should continue to focus on reporting and analysis of trade flows to prevent the spread of methamphetamine.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4669 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Baucus.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4669 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
